Description: Mould-made pottery with shoulder-volutes on the nozzle. The discus is decorated with a grasshopper eating fruit. Within the base-ring is impressed the name FAVST. Drab buff clay, covered with an orange-brown slip.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (1903)
Walters 1914 / Catalogue of Greek and Roman Lamps in the British Museum (716)
Lerat 1954 / Catalogue des collections archéologiques de Besançon: Les Lampes antiques (25)

Ozoil 1977 / Les Lamps du Musée de Chypre (p.79, note 6)

Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
